greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of the Lipschitz quaternions in a reduced system modulo n.
mathematica: cuater[n_] := Flatten[Table[{a, b,c,d},{a, n}, {b, n}, {c, n}, {d, n}], 3]; a[n_] := Length@Select[cuater[n], GCD[#.#, n] == 1 &]; Array[a,20]
results.author: _José María Grau Ribas_, Jul 13 2013
